name: ast4gen
description: AST that can be used for generation in almost all common target programming language

scripts.test: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test && istanbul report && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.test-simple: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test && istanbul report
